turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like to order pickup from Starbucks on Main Street, Islip, 455.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said that was main street?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a tall cappuccino with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was a tall cappuccino with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to your location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will the order be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall cappuccino with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on main street, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you so much. Have a good day. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
